title: Ticket #2045: Have gridmanager use the same Email object as the shadow
description: This ticket is similar to #1975, but the issue here is with the gridmanager instead of the schedd. Like the schedd, the gridmanager implements its own functionality for emailing the user when a job completes (basejob.cpp EmailTerminateEvent()). It should use the email object in the util lib (utils/email_cpp.cpp), just like the shadow does.
